Longmont Museum

Hours of Operation

During the construction of our new galleries, the Museum building will only be open during education and auditorium/courtyard program hours. We will not have general open hours until the gallery expansion is complete in Fall 2026.

Location

Longmont Museum

400 Quail Road

Longmont, CO 80501

303-651-8374

 

 

Explore the Winter 2026 Program Catalog to learn about upcoming events.

Exhibits Closed for Expansion, Programs Continue

The Longmont Museum galleries are now closed for construction until Fall 2026 as we work toward our exciting expansion.

 

Even though we will not have exhibits during this time, Museum education programs and auditorium events will continue!

 

Explore the Longmont Museum

Discover everything the Longmont Museum has to offer, from world-class exhibitions to engaging events and programs.

Educational Programs and Resources

From early childhood programs and school tours to adult creative classes, we provide interactive and engaging educational experiences.

Discovery Days

An early childhood program that encourages children and their caregivers to engage together in hands-on art, music and movement activities.

Teen Craft & Create Club

A free weekly drop-in program for teenagers to explore their creativity.

After School Music Classes

Join us on a musical adventure designed for beginners to try new musical opportunities and develop their skills.

School Break Camps

Need to keep your children engaged while school is out? Join us for creative school break camps!

Art & Sip and daytime adult art classes

Get creative with these classes designed to guide beginners as well as bring new skills to experienced artists and crafters.

Historic Longmont Walking Tours

Explore the special stories of Downtown Longmont, Historic Eastside Longmont, and Historic 3rd Avenue.

Support the Longmont Museum

The Longmont Museum relies on community support to offer diverse cultural experiences. There are many ways you can get involved.

 

 

 

 

Become a Museum member

Join the Giving Club

Make a donation

View more ways to get involved

Historic Collections

The Longmont Museum’s collection includes more than 17,000 objects, 10,000 photographs, and thousands of documents relating to Longmont and the St. Vrain Valley.

 

Virtual Historic Longmont Tours

Historic photographs, text and audio recordings that walk you through different aspects of Longmonts rich history from a handy mobile website.

Explore Tours

 

Online Historic Photo Collection

Explore more than 80,000 photographs showcasing Longmonts past, from the 1860s to present.

Explore Collection

Contact Us

We’d love to hear from you! Please reach out for general inquiries, membership services, ticketing, program registration and more.
